Instructions.Value: Renowned for its heavy punch, the Brutus Assault Tank features an impressive combination of long and short range firepower. It compares well to other fusion engine-equipped tanks of similar weight and role like the Von Luckner and Manticore, though unlike its contemporaries it carries relatively light armor in exchange for a heavier weapons array. This variant delivers long-range fires with two LRM20s and six tons of ammo. Tracked: High traction, agile turning. Movement: 3/5 Hex: 90/150 Meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 220 40 Left 185 40 Right 185 40 Rear 140 40 Turret 185 40 Total 915 200
